description.zh-cn: 晚清数学家，曾国藩三子。
description.en: A mathematician of the late Qing Dynasty, the third son of Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期政治家、战略家、理学家、文学家，湘军的创立者和统帅。
description.en: A Chinese statesman, military general, and Confucian scholar of the late Qing dynasty. He was the founder and commander of the Xiang Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个大一统封建王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾纪鸿撰写的数学著作，书中计算出100位的圆周率。
description.en: A mathematical work written by Zeng Jihong, in which the value of Pi was calculated to 100 decimal places.

description.zh-cn: 清代数学家，白芙堂数学团体的为首成员。
description.en: A mathematician of the Qing dynasty and a leading member of the Baifutang mathematics group.

description.zh-cn: 一个由丁取忠为首的晚清数学团体。
description.en: A late Qing dynasty mathematics group led by Ding Quzhong.

description.zh-cn: 清代数学家，白芙堂数学团体成员。
description.en: A mathematician of the Qing dynasty and a member of the Baifutang mathematics group.

description.zh-cn: 清代数学家，白芙堂数学团体成员。
description.en: A mathematician of the Qing dynasty and a member of the Baifutang mathematics group.

description.zh-cn: 清代数学家，白芙堂数学团体成员。
description.en: A mathematician of the Qing dynasty and a member of the Baifutang mathematics group.

description.zh-cn: 清代数学家，白芙堂数学团体成员。
description.en: A mathematician of the Qing dynasty and a member of the Baifutang mathematics group.

description.zh-cn: 一部收录了曾纪鸿、丁取忠、左潜、吴嘉善、李善兰、黄宗宪等人著作的数学丛书。
description.en: A series of mathematical books that includes works by Zeng Jihong, Ding Quzhong, Zuo Qian, Wu Jiashan, Li Shanlan, Huang Zongxian, and others.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，曾国藩同年进士，曾纪鸿的岳父。
description.en: An official of the Qing dynasty, who passed the imperial examination in the same year as Zeng Guofan, and was the father-in-law of Zeng Jihong.

description.zh-cn: 郭沛霖之女，曾纪鸿的妻子。
description.en: Daughter of Guo Peilin and wife of Zeng Jihong.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期由洪秀全建立的农民起义政权。
description.en: A rebel state in China and a peasant revolutionary movement during the late Qing dynasty, established by Hong Xiuquan.

description.zh-cn: 曾纪鸿与郭筠的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Zeng Jihong and Guo Yun.

description.zh-cn: 清朝外交家，曾国藩长子，曾纪鸿之兄。
description.en: A diplomat of the Qing dynasty, the eldest son of Zeng Guofan, and the elder brother of Zeng Jihong.

description.zh-cn: 曾纪泽之子，继承了祖父曾国藩的侯爵。
description.en: Son of Zeng Jize, who inherited the marquis title from his grandfather Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 曾纪鸿的四子。
description.en: The fourth son of Zeng Jihong.

description.zh-cn: 广铨之子，后过继给广銮为嗣。
description.en: Son of Guang Quan, later adopted by Guang Luan as his heir.

description.zh-cn: 清朝在江苏省设立的一个道级行政区划。
description.en: A circuit-level administrative division established in Jiangsu Province during the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 曾纪鸿是曾国藩的三子。
description.en: Zeng Jihong was the third son of Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 于1874年在湖南荷叶撰写了《圆率考真图解》一书。
description.en: Authored the book 'Yuanlü Kaozhen Tujie' in Heye, Hunan in 1874.

description.zh-cn: 曾纪鸿是白芙堂数学团体的成员之一。
description.en: Zeng Jihong was a member of the Baifutang mathematics group.

description.zh-cn: 丁取忠是白芙堂数学团体的为首成员。
description.en: Ding Quzhong was the leading member of the Baifutang mathematics group.

description.zh-cn: 与丁取忠等人合著多部数学著作。
description.en: Co-authored several mathematical works with Ding Quzhong and others.

description.zh-cn: 与左潜等人合著多部数学著作。
description.en: Co-authored several mathematical works with Zuo Qian and others.

description.zh-cn: 与吴嘉善等人合著多部数学著作。
description.en: Co-authored several mathematical works with Wu Jiashan and others.

description.zh-cn: 与李善兰等人合著多部数学著作。
description.en: Co-authored several mathematical works with Li Shanlan and others.

description.zh-cn: 与黄宗宪等人合著多部数学著作。
description.en: Co-authored several mathematical works with Huang Zongxian and others.

description.zh-cn: 曾纪鸿与他人合著的多部数学著作后被收入《白芙堂算学丛书》。
description.en: Several mathematical works co-authored by Zeng Jihong were later included in the 'Baifutang Suanxue Congshu'.

description.zh-cn: 郭筠是郭沛霖的女儿。
description.en: Guo Yun was the daughter of Guo Peilin.

description.zh-cn: 郭沛霖与曾国藩是同年进士。
description.en: Guo Peilin and Zeng Guofan passed the imperial examination in the same year.

description.zh-cn: 郭沛霖曾任职于江苏淮扬道道台。
description.en: Guo Peilin served as the Intendant of the Huai-Yang Circuit in Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 郭沛霖被太平军杀害。
description.en: Guo Peilin was killed by the Taiping army.

description.zh-cn: 在郭沛霖被太平军杀害后，其家属托付给曾国藩照护。
description.en: After Guo Peilin was killed by the Taiping army, his family was entrusted to the care of Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 曾广钧是曾纪鸿的长子。
description.en: Zeng Guangjun was the eldest son of Zeng Jihong.

description.zh-cn: 曾广钧是郭筠的长子。
description.en: Zeng Guangjun was the eldest son of Guo Yun.

description.zh-cn: 曾纪泽是曾国藩的长子。
description.en: Zeng Jize was the eldest son of Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 曾纪鸿是曾纪泽的弟弟。
description.en: Zeng Jihong was the younger brother of Zeng Jize.

description.zh-cn: 广銮是曾纪泽的儿子。
description.en: Guang Luan was the son of Zeng Jize.

description.zh-cn: 广铨是曾纪鸿的四子。
description.en: Guang Quan was the fourth son of Zeng Jihong.

description.zh-cn: 昭揆是广铨的儿子。
description.en: Zhao Kui was the son of Guang Quan.

description.zh-cn: 广銮无子，过继广铨的儿子昭揆为嗣子。
description.en: Guang Luan had no sons and adopted Zhao Kui, the son of Guang Quan, as his heir.
